---

>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/orgs/validate"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Confirms that the given organization name is valid and available for use. Append `?name=<your_org_name>` to specify the name to validate.
